An endless runner that’s actually worth your time. Also, probably the only free game of it’s class to have no ads. 

You won’t get lost in endless circles of fairly quests/global challenges/waiting to open chests. Just you, your fists, and an endless stream of baddies to punch. Oh, and a few gnomes to diefy along the way!

Such a good game to pass the time, really like the simple controls, mechanics and really fun gameplay. I have played this game in many devices for around 3 years and the only thing I wish is for the developers to give some update to the game somehow, please.

Fun and relentless. I specially enjoy the witty references to my childhood role playing games and fantasy tropes.
One of the best games I’ve played that killstime

Love the game, but ever since I've come back to it the ads really get in the way. I get they make money off of it, but it gets really annoying when I'm changing from the stats screen to changing my power ups and when I come back to the stats it triggers an ad. I'd be fine with just after a game over, but there's no reason I should get an ad just from switching menus.
It’s Yoasted

Me and my best friend have played this game off and on for about 6 years now it’s a timeless classic! But it hasn’t changed hardly at all since it came out! Why don’t you add more? Or remake it?

Please update to fit the whole iPhone x screen, that would be awesome and would look amazing and play perfectly. I’m not sure if y’all have ditched this game or anything, it’s a masterpiece, an arcade-style iOS touch game with easy controls and cool visuals. Please update AT LEAST to support the screen!!!
The game is amazing I can play it on the bus and you never get bored of this game!!!

I love this game so much. Even if the gameplay is simple, it makes up for it by having so many options for how your run can go. Everything is just so nicely packed together that honestly, I don’t even know how to finish this review. Even if this game won’t be updated anytime soon or at all, I’ll still keep brawling away for many months to come.
Games shames like this are like fine wine get better with age need more like thanks ...helps pass time and brings back the nostalgia. Of yesteryear

[update] Hadn’t player this in a long time, so I downloaded it again. I just lowered my rating by two stars because there is now an ad every time you play! And I even bought coins way back when!  Ugh SO annoying and disappointing.
[end update]

Three words: Get This Game!!  It's simply awesome. The feel of the gameplay is flawlessly fulfilling. It just feels so good to punch everything!  And graphics, sound, and price are great!

This game is very, very fun. I can’t stop playing it. With so many gnomes, zombies, imps, bats, orcs, skeletons, wraiths, skull squids, and a ton of other items and bosses scattered around the screen, it’s quite a handful. But this game takes the thrills of RPG, retro, and fighting games and stuffs them all in this one game. It’s a packaged deal, I’d say. Three different genres in one game. From the moment you start playing this game, it’ll be love at first sight.
The title says it all folks, this game is life
I’ve been playing this game since middle school and it’s never lost it’s fun, classic game that helps me relax, perfect game.

I’ve played this game off and on for along time and have always told folks, including my kids, to pick it up.  Now that it’s showing ads for 18+ games after every run, regardless if you’ve purchased anything, means that the game is going to be deleted.   Poor, short sighted decision.

Wow. They really have something here. Wish I could play this game with real buttons on a more traditional hand held gaming system...ok....Nintendo DS
Anyway... the game is very cool. Reminds me of the days when platform style games were all the rage and had original content. My advice to the developers is two ideas...
1.  Add more music themes please.. I really like the music you already have... please add more! 
2. Reward based intermissions would be cool... some kind of small story line excursion for reaching new heights in the game. 
My only real complaint is that I “donated” one dollar and the adds were not disabled. Come on guys... that’s kinda lame. I’m not going to continue playing the game until the ads are disabled. 
Fix this and I will give 5 stars and maybe even spend more on other in game content. 
Ryan from NY

Ive played this game since the day it came out and always downloaded it on all my devices. Im really hoping for an update that fixes all the little things in the game and maybe adds some new ways to customize your characters but anyway I just love this game so much. I really hope yoy guys make a next gen version for steam or allow someone to remake the game because I think Punch Quest is beautiful and would do really well as Punch Quest 2 or something. Cheers!

I haven’t played this game since 2012 and I forgot how awesome this game was I just recently re-downloaded the game and fell in love with game all over again and once agin this game is super amazing keep up the good work

If you can’t update the game, at least optimize this game for the newest IOS, so we can play it again. This is my favorite free to play mobile game, and I hate to see it disappear. Other than that this game is amazing, 5 stars out of 5.

This is my all time favorite mobile game! I’m begging you guys to please update this game and give it some love and let it flourish. It’s got so much potential and can easily be one of the best if you guys would just do some upkeep.
I love punch quest it’s fun weird and exciting.right now I’m saving up for spartan mode and it’s going good so far😃

title.label: I used to play this for hours at a time...

content.label: 5 years ago I could stop playing this game, after an update I lost all of my in game purchases that were earned with countless hours of playtime. I still think this game has massive potential. Unfortunately this latest update doesn’t reflect that in my opinion, there are now Ad’s and constant crashes, it is just sad to see potential go to waste.

This game exceeded my expectations. Definitely worth the money I spent on random upgrades. Highly recommended.

This game helped my brother keep him happy when he had a surgery so please update the game before the build expires. This game is amazing I just would like a update please. Like a new egg mini game, new boss or new super-move. A update would keep everyone loving this game for so much longer. The only super small complaint is that getting punchos is hard but it still isn't really bad. I can’t wait for new content, and maybe you could add a new enemy. My friends like the idea of a yeti villain. Also a ice punch super move like frost fists or something. I don’t know you guys develop games so you guys decide. I AM BEGGING YOU TO UPDATE THIS PLEASE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Also you guys said new update was coming so when. The mechanics of this game are so phenomenal. The graphics and every thing is amazing. So hence my question... why haven’t you updated it.
